name: Xeno Hive
description:
Rules are simple:  If they catch you, you die. If you run off the floor, you die. If they get hit in their weird alien faces with your mighty bullets, well... THEY DIE.  Every enemy has a special characteristic: Some explode when killed, others only take damage from the back. Some even affect the terrain! You can start with one of three different weapons each run! Keep going, discover the weak spots on the bossy aliens and survive as long as you can! If you get a highscore, congrats! Don't forget to submit it to the leader board! Have fun and kick some alien booty!!

CONTROLS

  • WASD - move
  • MOUSE - aim control
  • MOUSE LEFT - shoot
  • MOUSE RIGHT - reload
